page.title: 12GUIDES AND BROWNIES
page.content: The{Brownies}that I go to is on Tuesday and takes place at Great Witley Chapel.{Brown Owl}has two helpers{Snowy Owl}and{Tawny Owl.}The helpers organise games and Brown Owl does the work.We have sixes,the {Pixies,Elves,Kelpies,Imps}and {Sprites.}Each six has a leader and a seconder.We work for badges showing different skills. The most important thing that we do is the Brownie Ring.In the{Brownie Ring}we get into our sixes,we sing a rhyme and sit in a pow-wow.At the end we do Brownie Bells and then go home.{Guides}is a similar organisation for older girls.There are four{patrols}in the local pack.Each year there is a summer {camp}when girls take turns to cook,fetch water and chop fire wood. Last year the camp was held at Sutton near Tenbury Wells.
